channel-type.label: Cool at room over temp.
channel-type.description: This value indicates how many degrees over set room temp cooling will be allowed

channel-type.label: Cooling with room sensor
channel-type.description: Enables use of room sensor together with cooling 0=Off 1=On

channel-type.label: Start Active Cooling DM
channel-type.description: Value the degree minutes have to reach to start active cooling

channel-type.label: SMS40 accessory
channel-type.description: Activates the SMS40 accessory

channel-type.description: Activates the RMU accessory for system 1

channel-type.label: RMU System 4
channel-type.description: Activates the RMU accessory for system 4

channel-type.label: Allow Additive Heating
channel-type.description: Whether to allow additive heating (only valid for operational mode Manual)

channel-type.label: Allow Heating
channel-type.description: Whether to allow heating (only valid for operational mode Manual or Add. heat only)

channel-type.label: Allow Cooling
channel-type.description: Whether to allow cooling (only valid for operational mode Manual or Add. heat only)

channel-type.label: Start Temperature Cooling
channel-type.description: Start temperature for cooling, as set in menu 4.9.2 0=Off 1=On

channel-type.label: Stop Temperature Heating
channel-type.description: Stop temperature for heating, as set in menu 4.9.2

channel-type.label: Stop Temperature Additive
channel-type.description: Stop temperature for additive, as set in menu 4.9.2

channel-type.label: Outdoor Filter Time
channel-type.description: 12=12 Hours 24=24 Hours

channel-type.label: Date format
channel-type.description: 1=DD-MM-YY 2=YY-MM-DD

channel-type.label: Time format
channel-type.description: 12=12 hours 24=24 Hours

channel-type.label: HW production
channel-type.description: Activates hot water production where applicable 0=Off 1=On

channel-type.label: Alarm lower room temp.
channel-type.description: Lowers the room temperature during red light alarms to notify the occupants of the building that something is the matter 0=Off 1=On

channel-type.label: Alarm lower HW temp.
channel-type.description: Lowers the hot water temperature during red light alarms to notify the occupants of the building that something is the matter 0=Off 1=On

channel-type.description: When activated the system uses the room sensor 0=Off 1=On
